Sentencas: This study presents a novel approach for hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) - gas turbine (GT) system control.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: The approach is based on a plantwide top-down strategy which leads to a proper selection of the control structure.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: As a result, while maintaining the system stability and dynamic performance during transients, the system operation is also kept at optimal conditions using simple PI controllers.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: The optimization cost function is defined to be the unit price of the net produced electricity.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: The system inlet fuel flow and the power drawn from the SOFC are considered as the main system disturbances.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: The two-dimensional disturbance space is discretized.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: Rigorous optimization problems are performed in each disturbance node and variation of system efficiency and constraint values are evaluated.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: Three different operating regions, with different sets of active constraints, are characterized.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: Equivalent to the identified operating regions, an efficiency map is also provided which illustrates the achievable system efficiencies in presence of disturbances.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: Based on the optimization outcomes, the identification of appropriate controlled variables is accomplished in each region.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: It revealed that to keep near-optimal operation under various operating conditions; the combustion chamber outlet temperature should be treated as a key controlled variable.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: Finally, dynamic simulations are performed and the proficiency of the proposed control structure is justified.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system

Sentencas: According to the results, maximum SOFC temperature transients in all regions would be less than 2 K.min(-1) while variations on the hybrid system output power are kept below 3 % and efficiency loss is restricted to 2 %.
Titulo: Economic plantwide control of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell - gas turbine system
